analysis.key_quote: I oppose the reclassification of many federal employees (the proposed Schedule F), as this would destabilize and politicize positions that are filled by experienced and knowledgeable professionals who are not under the thumb of any political party.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed Schedule F, highlighting concerns about politicization and the importance of maintaining a merit-based system in federal positions, particularly in healthcare and science.
